GSD.product_version: versions from v5.9 to before v5.15.46
GSD.description:
ASoC: samsung: Fix refcount leak in aries_audio_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit 85d899f396622d3034643bf89615a78f9be7c91a, it was introduced in version v5.9 by commit 7a3a7671fa6c7e90aff5f4242add2a40587b85ef. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ASoC: samsung: Fix refcount leak in aries_audio_probe
